<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-14 18:56:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>f10deeab2fa50110a8ce2b5df699b66b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CMDB MAC Computer Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_f10deeab2fa50110a8ce2b5df699b66b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-14 19:00:37</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition table="cmdb_ci_computer">os=Mac OS/X^ORos=Mac OS 10 (OS/X)^EQ<item display_value="Mac OS/X" endquery="false" field="os" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Mac OS/X"/><item display_value="Mac OS 10 (OS/X)" endquery="false" field="os" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="Mac OS 10 (OS/X)"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></u_condition><u_conditional>true</u_conditional><u_description>Report on MAC comptuers</u_description><u_name>CMDB MAC Computer Script</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

var description = description;
currentRecord.short_description = description;
currentRecord.update();

var compString = '';
compString += "Name: " + currentRecord.getValue('name');
compString += "\nSerial Number: " + currentRecord.getValue('serial_number');

result = compString;]]></u_script><u_table>cmdb_ci_computer</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
